snippet: An article about America’s largest hate site, Stormfront, inspired readers to comment with questions for the author, Seth Stephens-Davidowitz. Here, he responds to a few themes.
abstract: An article about America’s largest hate site, Stormfront, inspired readers to comment with questions for the author, Seth Stephens-Davidowitz. Here, he responds to a few themes.

headline.main: Responding to Readers on ‘The Data of Hate’
